query: Recommend to user 33 some movies where the main character is pregnant.

tool_plan.note: To get the IDs of movies with a storyline where the main character is pregnant.
To get a personalized ranking of movies where the main character is pregnant for the user.
To get useful information to list the recommended items. 'title', 'genres', and 'description' should be retrieved.

arguments.items: <Python list of item IDs returned by vector_store_search_tool>
